You know what? I think I like Ugly Bastard and here's why:
Ugly Bastard makes the 'reality' aspect of it much less. It doesn't feel as real and so I'm able to have a good laugh at the end without feeling pain from empathizing myself with the MC. There's no way an ugly bastard like him would make a girl fall in love with him with dick for two reasons:
1) Being fat is a turn-off
2) Fat people don't have much stamina in bed
It would hurt more and be more realistic if it was a "good-looking bastard". Do you think an ugly bastard or a good-looking bastard would be able to NTR your girlfriend? The GL-Bastard would be more successful and that makes it more realistic => I empathize more strongly with the MC => Emotional damage. 
That's why fat bastard is better. It's like an extra protective wall.
